Tawfik (Arabic: توفيق), ma ọ bụ Tewfik, bụ aha nwoke Arab nyere aha
Aha a sitere na mgbọrọgwụ Arabic: waaw-faa-qaaf (و-ف-ق), nke pụtara ikwenye ma ọ bụ ime ka ọ dị n'otu
Tawfik sụgharịrị ya, "ikike ma ọ bụ ohere iji nweta ihe ịga nke ọma"
A na-eji mkpopu Tewfik ma ọ bụ Toufic karịa n'etiti ndị na-asụ French
Enwere ike iji Tawfik dị ka aha enyere ma ọ bụ nna nna
Ebe ọ bụ na a na-ewere ya dị ka aha "na-anọpụ iche" n'asụsụ Arabic, ọtụtụ Ndị Kraịst na-asụ Arabic nakwa ndị Alakụba na-akpọ Tawfik
Otu Turkish bụ Tevfik, nke Azerbaijani bụ Tofig ma ọ bụ Tofiq, nke Albania bụ Tefik, nke Bosnia bụ Teufik
N'asụsụ Hibru bụ Tovik ma ọ bụ Tuvik (תוביק)
Tawfik nwere otu ihe pụtara na Greek Tobias (Τοβίας)
Taoufik na Toufic bụ ndị a na-ahụkarị na North Africa (Morocco, Tunisia na Algeria).
